original_code:
import sys
input = sys.stdin.readline
from collections import Counter
n = int(input())
w = Counter(map(int, input().split()))
c = 0
for i in w:
    if i == 0:
        c += w[i] * (w[i] - 1)
    elif -i in w:
        c += w[i] * w[-i]
print(c // 2)
